General.Name: Celxpert Energy
General.Description: Celxpert Energy Corporation produces and sells battery packs in Taiwan. Its products are used in laptops and tablets, network devices, power and garden tools, and e-mobility and e-bike and energy storage products. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.128, Gong 5th Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan
